creator: eric@engr.pitt.edu
text:
Although I'm using virtualhosts and commented out the normal log settings, 
error.log is still created in logs/ despite setting log settings in the 
virtualhosts area for each virtual host and even with different names for the 
error and access log file for each virtual host.

It's a little unclear exactly what the main error log is getting used for.  If
it is only getting server-wide messages, then this seems perfectly appropriate.
 Apache needs a fall-back error log for when errors don't relate to a particular
vhost.
